titleStmt.title: The returne from Pernassus: or The scourge of simony Publiquely acted by the students in Saint Iohns Colledge in Cambridge.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Iohn Wright, and are to bee sold at his shop at Christ church gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
